title: 人在闽南，热到模糊
author: Evil_Zed
txt_content: 最近闽南这里又开始高温了，直接40几度往上飙，你们那边热吗

replies.author: 规范法规ing
replies.txt_content: 我们还是20几度

replies.author: 木大攻
replies.txt_content:
我这边今天也蛮热的、、
就是不会到40度这么夸张

replies.author: 西井丶
replies.txt_content:
日常33℃+，晚上风扇都吹不凉的那种
下点雨吧，热死人了

replies.author: Mr.时间之瓶
replies.txt_content: 还是蛮热的

replies.author: 冷风中nn
replies.txt_content: **热死了

replies.author: 零素
replies.txt_content:
一般35到37°C
日最低温也接近30了

replies.author: 小樱aaa
replies.txt_content: 我们这里都快发洪水了

replies.author: 糸左
replies.txt_content: 人在阴间，刚进地府

replies.author: FoF_xuy
replies.txt_content: 最近几天下雨 开着个电扇根本感觉不到热(

replies.author: 壹方净土
replies.txt_content: 舟山这边挺凉快的，估计是岛城的原因

replies.author: 许灬愿
replies.txt_content: 哇，chongqing还没这么夸张哩
我们这边这几天连着下雨，都有点冷

replies.author: 迷灬离
replies.txt_content:
Mr.时间之瓶 发表于 2020-7-12 13:32
还是蛮热的
这里蛮冷的

replies.author: FloatingBlocks
replies.txt_content: 浙南表示还行

replies.author: yjy15336695636
replies.txt_content: 31左右吧

replies.author: tianleoo
replies.txt_content: 希望人没事。

replies.author: zhangkaijianb
replies.txt_content: 我们这十几度=-= 很凉快

replies.author: Dicro_scrive
replies.txt_content: 40多也太热了吧，平生还没体验过四十多的感觉

replies.author: 问玄
replies.txt_content: 热热热，没事烤俩鸡蛋还不费火不错的说

replies.author: 北极仙光
replies.txt_content: 不热，还是二十几度

replies.author: 南镇
replies.txt_content: 40几度？ 做肉干嘛 ，太可怕了
**也热

replies.author: 啦啦拉
replies.txt_content: 偏南的地方就算下雨可能也不会凉快反而会有点闷热。

replies.author: Mr_Snake
replies.txt_content: 我这20度左右，40度是不是有点太夸张了...

replies.author: chw99szh
replies.txt_content: 不热，但下雨涨水。

replies.author: 时陨念
replies.txt_content: **的表示40度的话我会蒸发

replies.author: 大白白白白_Lee
replies.txt_content: ****最近白天开窗户风扇即可

replies.author: yxm1027
replies.txt_content: 我们这里不到30度，舒服啊

replies.author: MC_Muji
replies.txt_content:
西瓜+扇子配备齐全
一点都不热

replies.author: xie1ding
replies.txt_content: 好热 X x

replies.author: 102630464c
replies.txt_content: 我们这边就今天凉快

replies.author: BlackCF
replies.txt_content: 热的热 旱的旱。涝的涝，太难了

replies.author: tanjiahao
replies.txt_content: 下雨了·贼凉快

replies.author: haoli133609
replies.txt_content: 这几天就很热三十多这边

replies.author: tianliuwq
replies.txt_content: 我们这感觉也挺热的  35度左右
提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: 魅-内存君
replies.txt_content: 最近降温，好几天二十多度，之前热得受不了。
人在月球，非常凉快

replies.author: 缘若轻殇
replies.txt_content: 白天是烤炉，傍晚是闷炉，简直了

replies.author: LomOvO
replies.txt_content: 人在hb，下雨冷到模糊
